main.name: Amit Gill
main.bio: I've largely made a career in the automobile industry, from debugging and mechanical repair as a technician to process quality manager of said vehicles and systems. I have great passion in anything technological from AI to bare bones motor systems. After pursuing education in the digital side of technology, I am well versed in numerous coding languages and frameworks. From constructing web applications and creating websites, to building databases and parsing data from servers, I have great adaptability in the field.
main.contactmessage: Should you have any questions, inquiries, or network, feel free to message me:

resume.skillmessage: Below is a visual interpretation of my coherance of different scripting languages / frameworks

education.description: A Full Stack Coding and Web Development Program where I learned multiple coding languages and frameworks, how to create web based applications, and how to build back end infrastructure.
A program geared to Electronic Engineering where i learned about High Voltage circuits, digital / physical electronic integration, and electrical principles.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: As a multi-manager at this company, opportunities include implementing and maintaining network security, maintenance of local and remote servers, and repair of local area network data serving systems for inventory. Increasing company production efficiency by 30% by implementing new standard operating procedures and increasing machine uptime, improving facility to sustain 8 million in revenue, and streamlining order fulfillment 25% through frequent network audits and service.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: As a full stack developer the daily tasks include creating and maintaining repositories  for educational use. Literate in multiple languages and technologies required to edit scripts, including React, Express, MongoDB, Node.js, Jquery, CSS, and HTML.

work.title: Information Technology Manager / Equipment & Facility Manager
work.description: As a multi-manager at this company, opportunities include implementing and maintaining network security, maintenance of local and remote servers, and repair of local area network data serving systems for inventory. Increasing company production efficiency by 30% by implementing new standard operating procedures and increasing machine uptime, improving facility to sustain 8 million in revenue, and streamlining order fulfillment 25% through frequent network audits and service.

work.title: Quality Director
work.description: As the Quality Control Director, I created processes where quality checks were efficiently logged into proprietary systems. From there data graphs were compiled to gauge the quality of repair and process.

work.title: End of Line Repair Technician
work.description: As a Repair Technician, I was the last stop before the vehicle was delivered to clients from the main factory. I had the oppertunity to replace or repair these electric vehicles anywhere from adjusting or replacing physical components to modifying settings and updating firmware.

testimonials.text: Amit is a highly talented individual in all his fields, i would highly recommend his services
With Amit on our team, we've had the most production uptime in months. A high calibur individual who dedicates time to his work.
